attributes.action: Want the UK government to recognise the Armenian genocide and Nagorno Karabakh
attributes.additional_details:
I want the government to do this because I believe in the right of self-determination for the people of Nagorno Karabakh to choose to be part of Armenia or an independent country.

The government should recognise the genocidal crimes that have been committed against Armenians to put pressure on Turkey and Azerbaijan to recognise their crimes against Armenians
attributes.background:
Recognise the Armenian genocide to show solidarity with Armenia during the Nagorno Karabakh conflict and to stop Turkey and Azerbaijan from there war of aggression against
the people of Nagorno Karabakh
